text:
Senior Rails Developer | Calendly | Atlanta or Remote | https://calendly.com

Calendly makes life easy for business professionals and their customers by streamlining appointment scheduling through simple, beautiful software.

Apply Here: https://calendly.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk06zdu?referer=hacke...

Extensive experience with Ruby on Rails Knowledge of Rspec, experience with Capybara is a plus Experience with other object oriented languages Deep knowledge of Postgres Experience implementing a Service Oriented Architecture
